actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the act entitled "An act to establish the Big Cypress National Preserve in the State of Florida".

summary.text: Provides for gradually decreasing the payment of county property taxes by the United States over a five-year period on property purchased by the United States pursuant to the Act to establish the Big Cypress National Preserve in the State of Florida.

titles.title: A bill to amend the act entitled "An act to establish the Big Cypress National Preserve in the State of Florida".
